title: Lynda - Design the Web: Illustrator to Animated HTML5 Canvas
description:
Lynda - Design the Web: Illustrator to Animated HTML5 Canvas

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been post, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

48m 29s Beginner Oct 31, 2014   | Uploaded in Dec 22, 2015 by 2boweb

Subject: Web 
Software: HTML Illustrator 
Author: Chris Converse 

Learn to create a web animation from a simple Illustrator file, with Ai2Canvasâ€”a free plugin that works with nearly every version of Illustrator, from CS3 to CC. In this short Design the Web project, Chris Converse shows how to achieve complex animations with Ai2Canvas, simply by naming your layers with different animation properties. He also demonstrates how to combine properties like rotation and origin, for more interesting motion designs, and compress project files for web delivery. The exercise files for this course are free to all lynda.com members, so download them today.
